cu.explanation_en: Setting the ASN.1 verbosity to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause ASN.1 configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RA response window to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RA 回應視窗設定為 100 超過允許的最大值，導致配置驗證失敗。
